# Changelog

## 0.2.1 (11.11.2021)

Fixed TS definitions export.


## 0.2.0 (04.10.2021)

Added TS definition file.


## 0.1.2 (12.02.2021)

Fixed the behavior when plugin didn't work with entrypoints. 


## 0.1.1 (12.02.2021)

Removed postinstall hook that crashed installation process.


## 0.1.0 (11.02.2021)

Initial version.
